data.market_trends: Post-pandemic recovery in travel has seen an increase in interest for outdoor adventures and cultural experiences.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers today prefer immersive experiences rather than traditional sightseeing, prioritizing local interactions.
data.competitive_landscape: Despite competition, Guatemala's unique cultural heritage and diverse landscapes set it apart from other Central American destinations.
data.seasonal_factors: Travel interest peaks during the dry season, correlating with local holidays and festivals.
